casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Roland Lee WATTS, Jr. No. 70P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 3, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael K. Lands, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of January 2005 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of February 2005."
